name: RunDACPAC
description: Allows you to run DACPAC packages
author: Andrew Lackenby

inputs.name: packagePath
inputs.label: Specify a DACPAC file to run

inputs.name: serverName
inputs.label: Server Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Instance name of the SQL Server

inputs.name: userName
inputs.label: SQL Server Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: Login using SQL Authentication. Otherwise uses the login the build agent service runs under

inputs.name: userPassword
inputs.label: SQL Server Authentication password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password for SQL Authenication. You should use a secret variable here.

inputs.name: createNewDatabase
inputs.label: Create new database
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether the existing database will be dropped and a new database created before proceeding with the actual deployment actions. Acquires single-user mode before dropping the existing database.

inputs.name: logProgress
inputs.label: Log progress from DACPAC
inputs.helpMarkDown: Displays more details information when deploying the DACPAC
